definition: lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc

pinyin: Guo2 ji4 Wen2 chuan2 Dian4 xun4 she4
Ying1 guo2 Dian4 xun4 Gong1 si1

sentences.english: Verizon provides products and services in foreign languages.
sentences.chinese: 弗萊森電訊公司提供有外語說明的產品及外語服務。

sentences.english: It is devoted to discussion of Chinese T&I issues.
sentences.chinese: 它致力於向中國電訊我問題的討論。

sentences.english: It was not until the late Qing Dynasty that the trade of modern telecommunication emerged.
sentences.chinese: 直到晚清纔出現了近代的電訊業。

sentences.english: HGC reserves the right to revise these terms and conditions from time to time.
sentences.chinese: 和記環球電訊有權隨時修改此協議內的各項條款。

sentences.english: So the F. C. C. proposes to redefine broadband as a telecommunications service.
sentences.chinese: 因此，聯邦通訊委員會建議重新界定寬頻電訊服務。

sentences.english: Without myelin, the signal leaks and dissipates.
sentences.chinese: 沒有髓鞘的話，電訊號就會漏流而消散。

sentences.english: Hong Kong Broadband’s principal competitor is an older company, PCCW, which has several other lines of business, including phone, television and mobile.
sentences.chinese: 香港寬頻的主要競爭對手是一家老牌企業，電訊盈科。

sentences.english: While stock last for the free copies of HK Telecom Story Book.
sentences.chinese: 香港電訊業故事免費附送本，送完即止。

sentences.english: In the Telegraph interview, the chancellor said the British economy was "on the mend".
sentences.chinese: 在電訊報的採訪中，該大臣說英國經濟“正在轉好”。

sentences.english: The technology and telecommunications in Shenzhen are cutting edge!
sentences.chinese: 深圳的科技和電訊業遙遙領先。

sentences.english: By contrast, consolidation in banking and telecoms has been relatively slow.
sentences.chinese: 與之相反，銀行業和電訊業的合併進程相對較緩。

sentences.english: The Telegraph, a UK based news site employs social media experts.
sentences.chinese: 英國電訊報就專門僱傭社交媒體專家。

sentences.english: This paper presents an automatic speech recognition system based on electromyographic biosignals captured from the articulatory muscles in the face using surface electrodes.
sentences.chinese: 本論文提出一種使用構音肌電訊號的語音辨識系統。

sentences.english: The PCCW case was one of the SFC's highest-profile interventions.
sentences.chinese: 電訊盈科案是香港證監會最高調介入的案例之一。

sentences.english: Next, it appears, is another transformation of the Telegraph Media Group.
sentences.chinese: 看來，下一步，是電訊傳媒集團的又一個轉變。

sentences.english: OFTA will continue to conduct similar measurements as and when the situation warrants.
sentences.chinese: 電訊管理局將繼續進行類似的測試，當情況認股權證。

definition: operator (of a power station, transport network etc)/carrier (telecommunications etc)
merger and acquisition (M and A)/acquisition/to take over
